channel.title: DysiniX - A Reality Beyond Imagination
channel.description:
Website: [url=http://simplescape.net/]SimpleScape[/url] Forums: [url=http://simplescape.net/]Still In Development[/url] Vote: [url=http://simplescape.net/vote/]Vote[/url] Play Now: [url=http://simplescape.net/client/SimpleScape.jar]SimpleScape Client[/url]
Here are somethings that we've done to make it look less like Ruse-Ps and more like something we've put time and effort into. This list well be updated regularly. [SPOILER= Server/Client Updates] Added Bosses ★ Zulrah ★ Bork ★ Giant Mole ★ Barrel Chest - In Progress New Mini-games ★ Royal Rumble Content ★ New Interfaces ★ Zulrah Pet ★ New item borrowing system ★ Member area ★ Crystal Chest Location / Lair Fixes ★ Chaos Tunnels ★ Fullscreen Interfaces ★ Wilderness Agility course ★ Non-Clickable Objects Changes ★ New Login/Loading screen ★ Changes to home area - Npcs / Bosses ★ Replaced Ruse-PS Special with default world map. [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER= Updates and Fixes] ★ Issue with Female model equipment [FIXED] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5366432/Screen_Shot_2015-11-29_at_2.15.14_PM.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER= Features] ★ Bank Tabs ★ OSRS Bosses and Boss Pets ★ 24 Working skills ★ 20+ Bosses ★ Regular updates ★ Dedicated server ★ Mini-quests ★ Achievements ★ Item Borrowing - [NEW] ★ Player Examining - [NEW] ★ Working Website with automatic Vote / Highscores / Donations ★ Quests and Much More! [/SPOILER]
[SPOILER= Media] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5408414/Screen_Shot_2015-12-16_at_10.50.40_PM.png[/img]
[img]https://www.upload.ee/image/5365940/Screen_Shot_2015-11-29_at_10.15.44_AM.png[/img]

[/SPOILER]
[SIZE=2][B][I]Latest Update to the server was my own Zulrah system which i just released in Beta mode. Still have to work on a few things. Here are some images. [/I][/B][/SIZE] [SPOILER= Zulrah Media] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5443506/Screen_Shot_2015-12-31_at_12.19.11_PM.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5443507/Screen_Shot_2015-12-31_at_12.19.51_PM.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5443508/Screen_Shot_2015-12-31_at_12.20.17_PM.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/5443509/Screen_Shot_2015-12-31_at_12.20.40_PM.png[/img] [/SPOILER]
[SIZE=2][B][I]Royal Rumble is custom made mini game in which players are sent into a free for all field with low level armour and weapons to fight other players. Once a player has slaughtered another player, they will be equipped with better armour and weapons. This game is played for points which can be spent in a shop. [SPOILER= Royal Rumble Media][/I][/B][/SIZE] Media Coming Soon.... [/SPOILER][/CENTER]
Credits: Please let me know if i missed anyone. ★ Swiffy ★ Motivote Voting ★ 3clipse
NOTE: In need of Graphics Artist who can assist in further improving our background, creating a unique banner and logo.

item.title: DysiniX - A Reality Beyond Imagination
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

Bump the game is back up! i’ve decided to change the name to ‘DysiniX’.
It is pronounced [I][da-sin-ix][/I]. Simplescape didn’t really attract much attention.

Read full topic

item.title: DysiniX - A Reality Beyond Imagination
item.dc:creator: @x1_att_ftw_x x1 att ftw x
item.description:
@x1_att_ftw_x wrote:

Website: SimpleScape
Forums: Still In Development
Vote: Vote
Play Now: SimpleScape Client

Here are somethings that we’ve done to make it look less like Ruse-Ps and more like something we’ve put time and effort into.
This list well be updated regularly.
[SPOILER= Server/Client Updates]
Added Bosses
★ Zulrah
★ Bork
★ Giant Mole
★ Barrel Chest - In Progress
New Mini-games
★ Royal Rumble
Content
★ New Interfaces
★ Zulrah Pet
★ New item borrowing system
★ Member area
★ Crystal Chest Location / Lair
Fixes
★ Chaos Tunnels
★ Fullscreen Interfaces
★ Wilderness Agility course
★ Non-Clickable Objects
Changes
★ New Login/Loading screen
★ Changes to home area - Npcs / Bosses
★ Replaced Ruse-PS Special with default world map.
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER= Updates and Fixes]
★ Issue with Female model equipment [FIXED]

[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER= Features]
★ Bank Tabs
★ OSRS Bosses and Boss Pets
★ 24 Working skills
★ 20+ Bosses
★ Regular updates
★ Dedicated server
★ Mini-quests
★ Achievements
★ Item Borrowing - [NEW]
★ Player Examining - [NEW]
★ Working Website with automatic Vote / Highscores / Donations
★ Quests and Much More!
[/SPOILER]

[SPOILER= Media]

Screen_Shot_2015-11-29_at_10.37.28_AM.png1706×888

[/SPOILER]

[SIZE=2]Latest Update to the server was my own Zulrah system which i just released in Beta mode. Still have to work on a few things. Here are some images.
[/SIZE]
[SPOILER= Zulrah Media]

Screen_Shot_2015-12-31_at_12.19.11_PM.png2151×1202


[/SPOILER]

[SIZE=2]Royal Rumble is custom made mini game in which players are sent into a free for all field with low
level armour and weapons to fight other players. Once a player has slaughtered another player, they will be equipped with better
armour and weapons. This game is played for points which can be spent in a shop.
[SPOILER= Royal Rumble Media][/SIZE]
Media Coming Soon…
[/SPOILER][/CENTER]

Credits: Please let me know if i missed anyone.
★ Swiffy
★ Motivote Voting
★ 3clipse

NOTE: In need of Graphics Artist who can assist in further improving our background, creating a unique banner and logo.
